hero.title: Public Procurement Services
hero.desc: Our procurement center brings together expert teams with deep experience in scientific, educational, medical, and industrial sectors. We serve institutions nationwide with trusted supply-chain solutions and long-term partnerships. By 2024, total transaction volume exceeded RMB 35 billion.

services.title:
One-stop
Research Procurement
services.desc: End-to-end procurement solutions from needs assessment to delivery—simplifying workflows, saving time and cost, and ensuring quality and compliance. Coverage includes reagents, consumables, instruments, software, and consulting.

services.title:
Import & Export
Tax Consulting
services.desc: Professional tax planning and optimization for cross-border trade, including VAT and duty refunds, helping clients reduce burdens, manage risks, and improve capital efficiency.

services.title:
Tax Reduction &
Refund Agency
services.desc: Assistance with tax reduction and refund applications—policy review, qualification check, documentation, and submission—to minimize cost and accelerate cash flow.

services.title:
Import & Export
Agency Services
services.desc: Comprehensive import/export services: purchasing, transport, customs, warehousing, logistics, and compliance management—reducing risks and improving operational efficiency.

services.title:
Procurement &
Supply Chain Management
services.desc: Integrated management of sourcing, supplier negotiation, order and inventory control, and logistics—to ensure timely, accurate, and quality delivery of research materials.
